original: pīyūṣābhiniveśa eṣa rabhasād asmākam adyānayā bandhūkadyutibāndhavādhararasasyandena mandīkṛtaḥ /
analyzed: pīyūṣa abhiniveśaḥ eṣa rabhasāt asmākam adyā anayā bandhūka dyuti bāndhava adhara rasa syandena mandīkṛtaḥ

original: itthaṃ daityacayaḥ samudramathane yena kṣaṇād vañcitas tasmai sādaram oṃnamo 'stu kapaṭastrīrūpiṇe viṣṇave // JMu_1 //
analyzed: ittham daitya cayaḥ samudra mathane yena kṣaṇāt vañcitaḥ tasmai sādaram om namaḥ stu kapaṭa strī rūpiṇe viṣṇave

original: hāridradravasodarāya rasanāmaṃḍo(mātro)
analyzed: hāridra drava sodarāya

original: paristhāyine satyād anyatamāya vittaharaṇapratyakṣacaurāya ca /
analyzed: paristhāyine satyāt anyatamāya vitta haraṇa pratyakṣa caurāya ca

original: citraṃ durbhagarūpavarṇanamahāpāṇḍityavidyāya te vyājānāṃ prathamāya garbhagaṇikārāgāya tubhyaṃ namaḥ // JMu_2 //
analyzed: citram durbhaga rūpa varṇana mahā pāṇḍitya vidyāya te vyājānām prathamāya garbha gaṇikā rāgāya tubhyam namaḥ

original: dhyānaṃ yat parameśvaraṃ prati sadā yad vītarāgaṃ mano yat karmātikaṭhoraghoragahanaṃ bhūtyai yad atyādaraḥ /
analyzed: dhyānam yat parameśvaram prati sadā yat vīta rāgam manaḥ yat karma ati kaṭhora ghora gahanam bhūtyai yat ati ādaraḥ

original: āścaryaṃ ca śarīradānam api yat kāryaṃ vikāraṃ vinā tad veśyaiva tapasvinī kaliyuge loko 'pi tadbhāvitaḥ // JMu_3 //
analyzed: āścaryam ca śarīra dānam api yat kāryam vikāram vinā tat veśyā eva tapasvinī kali yuge tad bhāvitaḥ

original: śrīmantaṃ śirasā bibharti kurute viśvabhramaṃ helayā dhatte pāṭakapakṣapātam aniśaṃ naivāmiśais tṛpyati /
analyzed: śrīmantam śirasā bibharti kurute viśva bhramam helayā dhatte pāṭaka pakṣapātam aniśam na eva āmiśaiḥ tṛpyati

original: raktaṃ pātum apīhate ca sakalaṃ tārkṣyasya mūrtir yathā veśyā kiṃ tu bhujaṅgabhakṣaṇavidhau nādyāpi viśrāmyati // JMu_4 //
analyzed: raktam pātum api īhate ca sakalam tārkṣyasya mūrtiḥ yathā veśyā kim tu bhujaṅga bhakṣaṇa vidhau na adya api viśrāmyati

original: te gandharvapure vasantu vibhavaṃ svapnārjitaṃ bhuñjatāṃ kurvantu kṣaṇam antarikṣakusumaiḥ sragdāmaśobhām api /
analyzed: te gandharva pure vasantu vibhavam svapna arjitam bhuñjatām kurvantu kṣaṇam antarikṣa kusumaiḥ sragdāma śobhām api

original: veśyānāṃ śaśaśṛṅgabhaṅgisadṛśaṃ vāllabhyam āsādya ye sarvasvakṣapaṇāya kevalam aho mūrkhāḥ sukhenāsate // JMu_5 //
analyzed: veśyānām śaśa śṛṅga bhaṅgi sadṛśam vāllabhyam āsādya ye sarva sva kṣapaṇāya kevalam aho mūrkhāḥ sukhena āsate

original: śvaityaṃ kalpaya kajjale kapikuleṣv āropayācāpalaṃ kodaṇḍe janayārjavaṃ viracaya grāvṇāṃ gaṇe mārdavam /
analyzed: śvaityam kalpaya kajjale kapi kuleṣu āropaya a cāpalam kodaṇḍe janaya ārjavam viracaya grāvṇām gaṇe mārdavam

original: nimbe sādhaya mādhurīṃ surabhitām ādau rasone kuru premāṇaṃ gaṇikājane 'pi caturaḥ paścāt sakhe drakṣyasi // JMu_6 //
analyzed: nimbe sādhaya mādhurīm surabhi tām ādau rasone kuru premāṇam gaṇikā jane caturaḥ paścāt sakhe drakṣyasi

original: kālaś cet karuṇāparaḥ kaliyugaṃ yady adya dharmapriyaṃ nistriṃśo yadi peśalo viṣadharaḥ saṃtoṣadāyī yadi /
analyzed: kālaḥ ced karuṇā paraḥ kali yugam yadi adya dharma priyam nistriṃśaḥ yadi peśalaḥ viṣadharaḥ saṃtoṣa dāyī yadi

original: agniś ced atiśītalaḥ khalajanaḥ sarvopakārī sa ced āyuṣyaṃ yadi vā bhaviṣyati viṣaṃ veśyāpi tadrāgiṇī // JMu_7 //
analyzed: agniḥ ced ati śītalaḥ khala janaḥ sarva upakārī sa ced āyuṣyam yadi vā bhaviṣyati viṣam veśyā api tad rāgiṇī

original: mūḍho nirvyasano vaṇig vikapaṭo rājādhikārī śuciḥ svādhīno bhṛtako jaḍo guṇarataś cauro vyapetaspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ nirvyasanaḥ vaṇij vikapaṭaḥ rāja adhikārī śuciḥ svādhīnaḥ bhṛtakaḥ jaḍaḥ guṇa rataḥ cauraḥ vyapeta spṛhaḥ

original: bhītaḥ śāntamatir vitaḥ savinayaḥ karṇejapo dhārmikaḥ kiṃ kutrāpi kadāpi ko 'pi bhavitā veśyājano rāgavān // JMu_8 //
analyzed: bhītaḥ śānta matiḥ sa vinayaḥ karṇejapaḥ dhārmikaḥ kim kutra api kadāpi kaḥ pi bhavitā veśyā janaḥ rāgavān

original: {8c: for bhītaḥ var. nītaḥ}
analyzed: foḥ bhītaḥ var nītaḥ

original: kāmo nāsti napuṃsakasya kulaṭāvargasya nāsti trapā toyaṃ nāsti marīcikāsu satataṃ nāsti sthiratvaṃ śriyaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ nā asti napuṃsakasya kulaṭā vargasya nā asti trapā toyam nā asti marīcikāsu satatam nā asti sthira tvam śriyaḥ

original: dharmo nāsti ca nāstikasya vibhavo nāsti pramattātmanaḥ snehānāṃ kaṇikāpi nāsti gaṇikālokasya ca prāyaśaḥ // JMu_9 //
analyzed: dharmaḥ nā asti ca nāstikasya vibhavaḥ nā asti pramatta ātmanaḥ snehānām kaṇikā api nā asti gaṇikā lokasya ca prāyaśas

original: aśvīye yamavāhanasya nakulasyāśīviṣāṇāṃ kule mārjārasya ca mūṣakeṣu ghaṭate yā prītir ātyantikī /
analyzed: aśvīye yamavāhanasya nakulasya āśīviṣāṇām kule mārjārasya ca mūṣakeṣu ghaṭate yā prītiḥ ātyantikī

original: kṣīṇe 'rthe vidhureṣu bandhuṣu dṛḍhe lokāpavāde śanair jñeyā kāmijaneṣu saiva gaṇikāvargasya naisargikī // JMu_10 //
analyzed: kṣīṇe rthe vidhureṣu bandhuṣu dṛḍhe loka apavāde śanais jñeyā kāmi janeṣu sā eva gaṇikā vargasya naisargikī

original: yad yūtena yudhiṣṭhirasya vihitaṃ yad viṣṇunā vā baler yac chukreṇa dhanādhipasya kalinā rājño nalasyāpi yat /
analyzed: yat yūtena yudhiṣṭhirasya vihitam yat viṣṇunā vā baleḥ yat śukreṇa dhanādhipasya kalinā rājñaḥ nalasya api yat

original: saṃbhūyāpi ca yat surāsurabalair unmathya pāthonidher veśyā paśyata līlayaiva kurute tat tad gṛhe kāminām // JMu_11 //
analyzed: saṃbhūya api ca yat sura asura balaiḥ unmathya pāthonidheḥ veśyā paśyata līlayā eva kurute tat tat gṛhe kāminām

original: vākśurasya raṇo 'vadhiḥ kutanayotpattiḥ kulasyāvadhir bāndhavyasya vivādabhūmir avadhiḥ saukhyaṃ śrutasy avadhiḥ /
analyzed: vāc śurasya raṇaḥ vadhiḥ ku tanaya utpattiḥ kulasya avadhiḥ bāndhavyasya vivāda bhūmiḥ avadhiḥ saukhyam śrutasi avadhiḥ

original: vācāṭasya vidagdhaparṣad avadhir laulyaṃ vratasyāvadhir bandho viddhi dhanāvasānam avadhir veśyānurāgasya ca // JMu_12 //
analyzed: vācāṭasya vidagdha parṣad avadhiḥ laulyam vratasya avadhiḥ bandhaḥ viddhi dhana avasānam avadhiḥ veśyā anurāgasya ca

original: svāmī krūram ivāśritaṃ pariṇato yogīva saṃsāriṇaṃ śuddho vipra ivāntyajaṃ janapadaḥ śrīmān iva śvitriṇam /
analyzed: svāmī krūram iva āśritam pariṇataḥ yogī iva saṃsāriṇam śuddhaḥ vipraḥ iva antyajam janapadaḥ śrīmān iva śvitriṇam

original: dāsīputram ivoddhataḥ kuladharo nīco dhanīvārthinaṃ paryante tṛṇatulyam eva gaṇikā niḥsvaṃ janaṃ paśyanti // JMu_13 //
analyzed: dāsī putram iva uddhataḥ kula dharaḥ nīcaḥ dhanī iva arthinam paryante tṛṇa tulyam eva gaṇikāḥ niḥsvam janam paśyanti

original: vipro dakṣiṇayā mahaiḥ parijano meghodayaiḥ kārṣiko durmantrī vyasanena sāhasaśataiḥ śūro mṛgair lubdhakaḥ /
analyzed: vipraḥ dakṣiṇayā mahaiḥ parijanaḥ megha udayaiḥ kārṣikaḥ durmantrī vyasanena sāhasa śataiḥ śūraḥ mṛgaiḥ lubdhakaḥ

original: bandī tyāgibhir akṣarair janayitā lābhātirekair vaṇig rogārtair bhiṣag arbhakaiś ca gaṇikā garbheśvarais tuṣyati // JMu_14 //
analyzed: bandī tyāgibhiḥ akṣaraiḥ janayitā lābha atirekaiḥ vaṇij roga ārtaiḥ bhiṣaj arbhakaiḥ ca gaṇikā garbheśvaraiḥ tuṣyati

original: ajñānaḥ kalahaiḥ subhāṣitapadaiḥ sabhyo 'dhamaṛṇair dhanī jīvaiḥ śākuniko durodarakaraḥ śārair yamaḥ prāṇibhiḥ /
analyzed: ajñānaḥ kalahaiḥ subhāṣita padaiḥ sabhyaḥ dhama ṛṇaiḥ dhanī jīvaiḥ śākunikaḥ durodara karaḥ śāraiḥ yamaḥ prāṇibhiḥ

original: grāmīṇair viṭapeṭakaḥ parijanaiḥ svāmī śiśuḥ kandukaiḥ śrīputrais taruṇais tathā navanavair vārāṅganā krīḍati // JMu_15 //
analyzed: grāmīṇaiḥ viṭa peṭakaḥ parijanaiḥ svāmī śiśuḥ kandukaiḥ śrīputraiḥ taruṇaiḥ tathā nava navaiḥ vāra aṅganā krīḍati

original: bhṛtyaḥ kuprabhusevayā narapatiḥ svacchandatādurnayair hevākena kavir madena kulajaḥ krodhāgninā tāpasaḥ /
analyzed: bhṛtyaḥ ku prabhu sevayā narapatiḥ svacchanda tā durnayaiḥ hevākena kaviḥ madena kula jaḥ krodha agninā tāpasaḥ

original: yogī bhogaviśeṣalampaṭatayā rogī kupathyāśanaī rāgī catvarakāminīparicayaiḥ kṣiprād adhaḥ kṣipyate // JMu_16 //
analyzed: yogī bhoga viśeṣa lampaṭa tayā rogī ku pathya aśanaī rāgī catvara kāminī paricayaiḥ kṣiprāt adhas kṣipyate

original: śālīnāṃ śalabhavrajo dhuṇagaṇo vaṃśapratānonnater mattebhaḥ kamalākarasya kusumodyānasya durmārutaḥ /
analyzed: śālīnām śalabha vrajaḥ dhuṇa gaṇaḥ vaṃśa pratāna unnateḥ matta ibhaḥ kamala ākarasya kusuma udyānasya durmārutaḥ

original: svasbhānur vidhumaṇḍalasya vaḍavāvakro nidher ambhasā māsāṃ kāmukasaṃpadāṃ ca gaṇikākṣudraḥ kīlopadravaḥ // JMu_17 //
analyzed: vidhu maṇḍalasya vaḍavā vakraḥ nidheḥ ambhasā māsām kāmuka saṃpadām ca gaṇikā kṣudraḥ kīla upadravaḥ

original: śauryasyātivikatthanaṃ ripunatir mānasya duḥśīlatā saundaryasya samunnates taralatā jñānasya garvagrahaḥ /
analyzed: śauryasya ati vikatthanam ripu natiḥ mānasya duḥśīla tā saundaryasya samunnateḥ tarala tā jñānasya garva grahaḥ

original: aiśvaryasya vikāratā mukharatā vidyāprakarṣasya ca bhrātarvibhramanarmaṇaś ca gaṇikā sarvātmanā dūṣaṇam // JMu_18 //
analyzed: aiśvaryasya vikāra tā mukhara tā vidyā prakarṣasya ca bhrātar vibhrama narmaṇaḥ ca gaṇikā sarva ātmanā dūṣaṇam

original: cchāyām abhradalaiḥ khalaiḥ sujanatāṃ mānonnatiṃ yācñayā kārpaṇyena yaśāṃsi dhūrtakalayā maitrīṃ sukhaṃ sevayā /
analyzed: chāyām abhra dalaiḥ khalaiḥ su jana tām māna unnatim yācñayā kārpaṇyena yaśāṃsi dhūrta kalayā maitrīm sukham sevayā

original: dharmaṃ prāṇivadhena vāñchati dhanaṃ dyūtaprasādeba yo veśyābhiś ca vilāsam ātmani narākāro 'sti gaur eva saḥ // JMu_19 //
analyzed: dharmam prāṇi vadhena vāñchati dhanam dyūta prasāda iva yaḥ veśyābhiḥ ca vilāsam ātmani nara ākāraḥ sti gauḥ eva saḥ

original: nāndho mūrkhasamo na sevakasamo duḥkhī na yakṣmopamo vyādhir nādhir asatsutapratinidhis trāso na bhṛtyoḥ samaḥ /
analyzed: na andhaḥ mūrkha samaḥ na sevaka samaḥ duḥkhī na yakṣma upamaḥ vyādhiḥ na ādhiḥ asat suta pratinidhiḥ trāsaḥ na bhṛtyoḥ samaḥ

original: kaṣṭaṃ nādhvasamānam indriyasamo nāriḥ parastrīsamaṃ nānāyuṣyam avaśyanindyam atha no veśyāsamaṃ dṛśyate // JMu_20 //
analyzed: kaṣṭam na adhva samānam indriya samaḥ na ariḥ para strī samam na an āyuṣyam avaśya nindyam atha no veśyā samam dṛśyate

original: kiṃ kāko 'pi vihaṃgamo marur api sthānaṃ karīro 'pi kiṃ śākhī rāhur api grahaḥ sa ca bhaved uṣṭro 'pi kiṃ vā[ha]tam /
analyzed: kim kākaḥ pi vihaṃgamaḥ maruḥ api sthānam karīraḥ pi kim śākhī rāhuḥ api grahaḥ sa ca bhavet kim vā āhatam

original: kiṃ kāco 'pi maṇir mṛgo 'pi karaṭiḥ preṣyo 'pi vā mānuṣaḥ kiṃ veśyāpi vilāsinī sa ca tadāsakto 'pi kiṃ kāmukaḥ // JMu_21 //
analyzed: kim maṇiḥ mṛgaḥ pi karaṭiḥ preṣyaḥ pi vā mānuṣaḥ kim veśyā api vilāsinī sa ca tad āsaktaḥ pi kim kāmukaḥ

original: kiṃ tat karma yad astaśarma rasanā kiṃ sā na (ca)
analyzed: kim tat karma yat asta śarma rasanā kim sā na ca

original: yāruṃtudā kiṃ tat prema yad asthiraṃ sa ca pumān kiṃ nāma yo nirguṇaḥ /
analyzed: kim tat prema yat asthiram sa ca pumān kim nāma yaḥ nirguṇaḥ

original: sā kiṃ śrīr upabhogam arhati na yā sevyaḥ sa kiṃ yo 'ntaraṃ no jānāti tad asti kiṃ vilasitaṃ veśyāsu yat kṛtrimam // JMu_22 //
analyzed: sā kim śrīḥ upabhogam arhati na yā sevyaḥ sa kim yaḥ ntaram no jānāti tat asti kim vilasitam veśyāsu yat kṛtrimam

original: dūre tāni dhanāni yeṣu malanaṃ mānasya saṃjāyate bandhuḥ sa astu sukhī mukhe madhumayo yo 'ntaś ca māyāmayaḥ /
analyzed: dūre tāni dhanāni yeṣu malanam mānasya saṃjāyate bandhuḥ saḥ astu sukhī mukhe madhu mayaḥ yaḥ ntar ca māyā mayaḥ

original: bhogāḥ pralayaṃ prayāntu katham apy aucityabhaṅgena ye yāyātur nidhanaṃ varaṃ nidhuvanaṃ veśyāsu mūlyena yat // JMu_23 //
analyzed: bhogāḥ pralayam prayāntu katham api aucitya bhaṅgena ye yāyātuḥ nidhanam varam nidhuvanam veśyāsu mūlyena yat

original: asthānābhiniveśitā ratipater aucityabhaṅgo rater vaiyarthyaṃ navayauvanasya kim api premṇaḥ kalaṅkāṅkuraḥ /
analyzed: asthāna abhiniveśi tā ratipateḥ aucitya bhaṅgaḥ rateḥ vaiyarthyam nava yauvanasya kim api premṇaḥ kalaṅka aṅkuraḥ

original: saubhāgyasya vimānanā viguṇatā saundaryasāraśriyaḥ śṛṅgārasya viḍambanā kim aparaṃ veśyārataḍambaraḥ // JMu_24 //
analyzed: saubhāgyasya vimānanā viguṇa tā saundarya sāra śriyaḥ śṛṅgārasya viḍambanā kim aparam veśyā rata ḍambaraḥ

original: kruddho yasya manobhavas taruṇimā yenātmano vañcitas tais tair yaś ca kaṭākṣitaḥ paribhavaiḥ sākṣād alakṣmīmukhaiḥ /
analyzed: kruddhaḥ yasya manobhavaḥ taruṇimā yena ātmanaḥ vañcitaḥ taiḥ taiḥ yaḥ ca kaṭākṣitaḥ paribhavaiḥ sākṣāt alakṣmī mukhaiḥ

original: yuktāyuktavicāraṇāparihṛtaḥ kāmaṃ sa kāmī krimiḥ paṇyastrīṣu nitambanāmani mahānimbe ratiṃ vindati // JMu_25 //
analyzed: yukta ayukta vicāraṇā parihṛtaḥ kāmam sa kāmī krimiḥ paṇya strīṣu nitamba nāmani mahānimbe ratim vindati

original: śāpaḥ ko 'pi mahānayaṃ pariṇatir duṣkarmaṇām īdṛśī daurjanyaṃ paramaṃ vidher idam iyaṃ sākṣād alakṣmī sthirā /
analyzed: śāpaḥ kaḥ pi mahān ayam pariṇatiḥ duṣkarmaṇām īdṛśī daurjanyam paramam vidheḥ idam iyam sākṣāt alakṣmī sthirā

original: sauhārdasya ca vibhramasya ca rater bhartuś ca yūnāṃ tathā yat saṃtyajya kulāṅganāṃ bahumukho dāsījanaḥ sevyate // JMu_26 //
analyzed: sauhārdasya ca vibhramasya ca rateḥ bhartuḥ ca yūnām tathā yat saṃtyajya kula aṅganām bahu mukhaḥ dāsī janaḥ sevyate

original: saṃparko 'py atikarkaśaḥ paricayābhāso 'py asaṃpatkaro dṛkpāto 'py avasādasūr api sakṛt saṃbhāṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: saṃparkaḥ pi ati karkaśaḥ paricaya ābhāsaḥ api a saṃpad karaḥ dṛś pātaḥ api avasāda sūḥ api sakṛt saṃbhāṣaṇam dūṣaṇam

original: chāyāpi cchalanātmikā parimalodgāro 'pi hālāhalaṃ veśyānāṃ viṣayeṣu kiṃ puno 'ho saktir mahāsāhasam // JMu_27 //
analyzed: chāyā api chalana ātmikā hālāhalam veśyānām viṣayeṣu kim punar ho saktiḥ mahāsāhasam

original: droho yasya pitā kalāḥ kila catuḥṣaṣṭis tathā mātaraḥ prāṇāḥ sarvam alīkam arthaharaṇaṃ nāma pradhānavratam /
analyzed: drohaḥ yasya pitā kalāḥ kila catuḥṣaṣṭiḥ tathā mātaraḥ prāṇāḥ sarvam alīkam artha haraṇam nāma pradhāna vratam

original: vikreyaṃ nijam aṅgam aṅgam api cānaṅgaḥ sahāyaḥ svayaṃ tasyānarthaśatātmakasya gaṇikāvyādheḥ kim asty auṣadham // JMu_28 //
analyzed: vikreyam nijam aṅgam aṅgam api ca anaṅgaḥ sahāyaḥ svayam tasya anartha śata ātmakasya gaṇikā vyādheḥ kim asti auṣadham

original: gṛdhrī nirbharam āmiṣeṣu saraghā ghorā madhūnāṃ bhare tīkṣṇanakhakṣateṣu bhujagī daṃśaprakāreṣu ca /
analyzed: gṛdhrī nirbharam āmiṣeṣu saraghā ghorā madhūnām bhare tīkṣṇa nakha kṣateṣu bhujagī daṃśa prakāreṣu ca

original: uttāneṣu vivartaneṣu śaphari vittacchale mūṣikā veśyā kāmukavañcanāya bhuvane rūpair anekaiḥ sthitā // JMu_29 //
analyzed: uttāneṣu vivartaneṣu śaphari vitta chale mūṣikā veśyā kāmuka vañcanāya bhuvane rūpaiḥ anekaiḥ sthitā

original: sāmrājyaṃ madhumāṃsamatsyagilanaṃ mantrī jaratkuṭṭanī daṇḍyaḥ sārthakirāṭasūnuradhanāḥ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ kiṅkarāḥ /
analyzed: sāmrājyam madhu māṃsa matsya gilanam mantrī jarat kuṭṭanī daṇḍyaḥ sārtha kirāṭa sūnuḥ adhanāḥ śṛṅgāriṇaḥ kiṅkarāḥ

original: ācāro bahugālidānam adhamo mitraṃ dhanaṃ jīvitaṃ veśyānāṃ puracāra ... tha bhagnaḥ priyaḥ // JMu_30 //

original: rāgīti pratipattibhūr vita iti prāpto 'tivandyaṃ padaṃ ślāghārho vyasanīti hīnakula ity agryaḥ kuṭumbaḥ svayam /
analyzed: rāgī iti pratipatti bhūḥ vitaḥ iti prāpta u tivandyam padam ślāghā arhaḥ vyasanī iti hīna kulaḥ iti agryaḥ kuṭumbaḥ svayam

original: mānyaḥ prāhata ity aho kitava ity āptaś ca kiṃ vādhikaṃ sarvāvastha iti pramāṇapuruṣo veśyābhir abhyarcyate // JMu_31 //
analyzed: mānyaḥ prāhataḥ iti aho kitavaḥ iti āptaḥ ca kim vā adhikam sarva avasthaḥ iti pramāṇapuruṣaḥ veśyābhiḥ abhyarcyate

original: māṃspākotkaṭamadyagandhi viharacceṭīnaṭīsaṃkulaṃ yad veśyāyatanaṃ bhujaṃga parayā bhaktyā puraḥ paśyasi /

original: atrāste gṛhadevatā vidadhatī digghaṭṭanaṃ kuṭṭanī yasyāḥ pratyaham āḍhyakāmukapaśuvrātopahārair baliḥ // JMu_32 //
analyzed: atra āste gṛha devatā vidadhatī diś ghaṭṭanam kuṭṭanī yasyāḥ pratyaham āḍhya kāmuka paśu vrāta upahāraiḥ baliḥ

original: {32a: on māṃspākā see Pāṇini 6.1.144:
analyzed: or māṃspākā see pāṇini

analyzed: apara sa parāḥ kriyā sātatye

original: pratyaṅgārpaṇacārucāṭukaraṇapremocitaprārthanā śrīvātāyanadarśanādigaṇikālokasya dharmaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: pratyaṅga arpaṇa cāru cāṭu karaṇa prema ucita prārthanā śrīvātāyana darśana ādi gaṇikā lokasya dharmaḥ paraḥ

original: kuṭṭanyāḥ puna utkaṭotkaṭam idaṃ tatrāsty agastyavrataṃ yat prāṇāhutir ekakaiva sakalaī ratnākaraiḥ kāmibhiḥ // JMu_33 //
analyzed: kuṭṭanyāḥ punar utkaṭa utkaṭam idam tatra asti agastyavratam yat prāṇāhutiḥ ekakā eva ratnākaraiḥ kāmibhiḥ

original: kandarpapratibhūniveśitavalīrekhāvalīśobhite līlodañcitabāhupāśayugalāpātaiś ca bhoḥ kāmukāḥ /
analyzed: kandarpa pratibhū niveśita valī rekhā āvalī śobhite līlā udañcita bāhu pāśa yugala āpātaiḥ ca bhoḥ kāmukāḥ

original: veśyānāṃ vipule nitambaphalake śāraiḥ kaṭākṣair ito yad vaḥ krīḍitam atra dāsyati puro dāridram evottaram // JMu_34 //
analyzed: veśyānām vipule nitamba phalake śāraiḥ kaṭākṣaiḥ itas yat vaḥ krīḍitam atra dāsyati puras dāridram evā uttaram

original: śūlenādya mṛtāham adya sarajāḥ kartavyam adya vrataṃ tyāgī nāsti tato 'dhiko 'para iti ślāghā vipakṣasya ca /

original: kaṃ cin notsahate sa rājatanayo jānāti mātā mamety evaṃ mugdhabhujaṃga rūkṣagaṇikāvāco 'cirāc chroṣyasi // JMu_35 //
analyzed: kam cit nā utsahate sa rāja tanayaḥ jānāti mātā mama iti evam mugdha bhujaṃga rūkṣa gaṇikā vācaḥ cirāt śroṣyasi

original: mālinyaṃ prakaṭikaroti nibiḍaṃ nairguṇyam ātanvate(sī)
analyzed: mālinyam prakaṭi karoti nibiḍam nairguṇyam ātanvatā isī

original: jīrṇasnehaparamparā vidadhate pātre 'py aho dūṣaṇam /
analyzed: jīrṇa sneha paramparā vidadhate pātre pi aho dūṣaṇam

original: veśyā dīpaśikheva bhāti rajanau rūpabhramāndhīkṛto yatrāyaṃ kurute pataṅgapatanaṃ hā hā bhujaṃgavrajaḥ // JMu_36 //
analyzed: veśyā dīpa śikhā iva bhāti rajanau rūpa bhrama andhīkṛtaḥ yatra ayam kurute pataṅga patanam hā hā bhujaṃga vrajaḥ

original: keśākarṣaṇakarmaṇi vyavasitā vīryaṃ harantī paraṃ mlāniṃ kām api tanvatī smitamukhī lagnā ca karṇāntike /

original: utkampaṃ mativibhramaṃ vidadhatī yūnāṃ śanair ninditā tāruṇyasya janāpavāda ... veśyā ca saṃdṛśyate // JMu_37 //
analyzed: utkampam mati vibhramam vidadhatī yūnām śanais ninditā tāruṇyasya jana apavāda veśyā ca saṃdṛśyate

original: yo 'yaṃ nirdayadantakhaṇḍanakaro buddhiprayogair haṭhān nīrandhro bhujayantrapīḍanavidhiḥ sollāsam utpāditaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yam nirdaya danta khaṇḍana karaḥ buddhi prayogaiḥ haṭhāt nīrandhraḥ bhuja yantra pīḍana vidhiḥ sa ullāsam utpāditaḥ

original: tenekṣor iva kāmukasya sarasasyādāya sāraṃ paraṃ veśyābhiḥ kriyate bahir yadi paraṃ niṣkāsanaṃ śalkavat // JMu_38 //
analyzed: tena ikṣoḥ iva kāmukasya sarasasya ādāya sāram param veśyābhiḥ kriyate bahis yadi param niṣkāsanam śalka vat

original: {38d: śalka=śakala}
analyzed: śalka śakala

original: vāgbhir bhartsanam aṃśukādiharaṇaṃ saṃtāḍanaṃ muṣṭibhiḥ kiṃ cānyad viparītadarśnam adhaskāro 'tha pādāhatiḥ /
analyzed: vāgbhiḥ bhartsanam aṃśuka ādi haraṇam saṃtāḍanam muṣṭibhiḥ kim ca anyat viparīta darśnam pāda āhatiḥ

original: ityādi prathamaṃ yadeva surataprauḍhopacārakrame veśyā paśyata tat tad eva kurute nirvāsane kāminām // JMu_39 //
analyzed: ityādi prathamam yat eva surata prauḍha upacāra krame veśyā paśyata tat tat eva kurute nirvāsane kāminām

original: yad bhūyaḥ paricumbanaṃ yad asakṛtsarvāṅgam āliṅganaṃ yat paryutsukam īkṣitaṃ sarabhasaṃ yac cāṭukotkaṭṭanam(utkīrtanam?) /
analyzed: yat bhūyas paricumbanam yat asakṛt sarva aṅgam āliṅganam yat paryutsukam īkṣitam sarabhasam yat cāṭuka utkaṭṭanam utkīrtanam

original: yat sadbhāvakathānakaṃ rahasi yat kiṃ cid abhyarthanaṃ veśyānāṃ viṣavat tad eva nipuṇaṃ cintyaṃ sadā kāmukaiḥ // JMu_40 //
analyzed: yat sadbhāva kathānakam rahasi yat kim cit abhyarthanam veśyānām viṣa vat tat eva nipuṇam cintyam sadā kāmukaiḥ

original: bibboke bakaceṣṭitaṃ bahuvidhabhrūvibhrameṣu bhramaṃ kauṭilyaṃ nakharakṣateṣu suratopāyeṣu māyāṃ svayam /
analyzed: bibboke baka ceṣṭitam bahuvidha bhrū vibhrameṣu bhramam kauṭilyam nakhara kṣateṣu surata upāyeṣu māyām svayam

original: sītkārāntarasatyam arthaharaṇaṃ sarvatra ye jānate veśyānāṃ paramaṃ rahasyam avanau te ke 'pi medhāvinaḥ // JMu_41 //
analyzed: sītkāra antara satyam artha haraṇam sarvatra ye jānate veśyānām paramam rahasyam avanau te ke medhāvinaḥ

original: kiṃ cit prāhuṇakāgamena kim api prastāravistāravad yātrācaitratithikramaiḥ kim api ca krodhaprasādodayaiḥ /

original: kiṃ cit kāñcanaratnavastraviṣayair nānāvidhair dohadair dvārāṇy arthavinirgamasya gaṇikāḥ kurvanti śṛṅgāriṇām // JMu_42 //
analyzed: kim cit kāñcana ratna vastra viṣayaiḥ nānāvidhaiḥ dohadaiḥ dvārāṇi artha vinirgamasya gaṇikāḥ kurvanti śṛṅgāriṇām

original: {42a: prāhuṇaka= a guest}
analyzed: prāhuṇaka a guest

original: arthuṣmā pitṛlālanaṃ viṭaghaṭāmelaḥ priyammanyatā tāruṇyaṃ nagare sthitis taralatā dhiḥ kāmaśāstraṃ prati /
analyzed: pitṛ lālanam viṭa ghaṭā melaḥ priyammanya tā tāruṇyam nagare sthitiḥ tarala tā dhiḥ kāmaśāstram prati

original: saṅgītaṃ rajanī vidhur madhumadaḥ spardhā sapatnais tathā veśyānām anuraktavittaharaṇe kurvanti sāhāyakam // JMu_43 //
analyzed: saṅgītam rajanī vidhuḥ madhu madaḥ spardhā sapatnaiḥ tathā veśyānām anurakta vitta haraṇe kurvanti sāhāyakam

original: vaidagdhīm avadhīraya vyavahitaṃ kāryaṃ kalākauśalaṃ saujanyena gataṃ kim anyad aphalo rāśir guṇānām api /

original: yasmān na praṇayena na praṇatibhiḥ premṇā na na prīṇanair na prāṇair api te bhujaṃga gaṇikā vittaṃ vinā tuṣyati // JMu_44 //
analyzed: yasmāt na praṇayena na praṇatibhiḥ premṇā na na prīṇanaiḥ na prāṇaiḥ api te bhujaṃga gaṇikā vittam vinā tuṣyati

original: dāsī nātha tavāham eva vibhavaḥ sarvas tvadīyaḥ sthito mā māṃ nirdaya muñca śūnyam akhilaṃ manye jagat tvāṃ vinā /

original: ity uktvā sahasā bhujaṅgapurato yad veśyayā rudyate bhuktocchiṣṭadaridrakāmivibhavās te kevalaṃ tad viduḥ // JMu_45 //
analyzed: iti uktvā sahasā bhujaṅga puratas yat veśyayā rudyate bhukta ucchiṣṭa daridra kāmi vibhavāḥ te kevalam tat viduḥ

original: svapne kām api saṃsmaran priya mayā dṛṣṭo 'si tat te balād evaṃ māṃ prati sāṃprataṃ kim ucitā niṣkāraṇaṃ vañcanā /
analyzed: svapne kām api saṃsmaran priya mayā dṛṣṭaḥ si tat te balāt evam mām prati sāṃpratam kim ucitā niṣkāraṇam vañcanā

original: taj jāgarmi varaṃ niśāsu yad asau nidrāpi me drohiṇīty ālāpair gaṇikāgaṇena na ca ko viśvāsyate kāmukaḥ // JMu_46 //
analyzed: tat jāgarmi varam niśāsu yat asau nidrā api me drohiṇī iti ālāpaiḥ gaṇikā gaṇena na ca kaḥ viśvāsyate kāmukaḥ

original: bhrūbhaṅgair atibhaṅguraiḥ kuṭilitaprāntas tathā kuntalaiḥ sopekṣair iva cakṣuṣoḥ saralitāpāṅgaiś ca bhaṅgyantaraiḥ /
analyzed: bhrū bhaṅgaiḥ ati bhaṅguraiḥ kuṭilita prāntaḥ tathā kuntalaiḥ sa upekṣaiḥ iva cakṣuṣoḥ saralita apāṅgaiḥ ca bhaṅgi antaraiḥ

original: ātmīyāṃ calacittavṛttiracanāṃ veśyā varākī sadā yūnāṃ darśayatīva te yadi paraṃ mūḍhā na taj jānate // JMu_47 //
analyzed: ātmīyām cala cittavṛtti racanām veśyā varākī sadā yūnām darśayati iva te yadi param mūḍhāḥ na tat jānate

original: vakroktyā prathamaṃ nirādaratayā paścāt tataḥ kena cid dātavyaṃ bahu tatra yāmi bhavatām(tād)

original: bhūyo 'pi nau saṃgamaḥ /
analyzed: bhūyaḥ pi nau saṃgamaḥ

original: ity ukto 'pi na budhyate khalu yadā rāgī daridro jaḍaś ceṭībhir bahubhāṣitair api tadā hastārgalair vāryate // JMu_48 //

original: bhūyaḥ kālavaśāt tam arjitadhanaṃ dṛṣṭvātha madvallabhaḥ saḥ kruddho gamitas tvayeti kalaho mātrā samaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: bhūyas kāla vaśāt tam arjita dhanam dṛṣṭvā atha mad vallabhaḥ saḥ kruddhaḥ gamitaḥ tvayā iti kalahaḥ mātrā samam jāyate

original: kṛtvā taṃ prati ca vratādi virahaṃ svaṃ nāṭayitvā tatas tasmin mitramukhena saṃdhir aparo veśyābhir utpādyate // JMu_49 //
analyzed: kṛtvā tam prati ca vrata ādi viraham svam nāṭayitvā tatas tasmin mitra mukhena saṃdhiḥ aparaḥ veśyābhiḥ utpādyate

original: prauḍha prāṇada kānta nātha subhagodāra priya tvāṃ vinā kiṃ vittena gṛheṇa kiṃ kim asubhir hyo 'pīti yo bhāṣitaḥ /
analyzed: prauḍha prāṇa da kānta nātha subhaga udāra priya tvām vinā kim vittena gṛheṇa kim kim asubhiḥ yaḥ bhāṣitaḥ

original: tasyaivādya nirāśa durbhaga paśo nirlajja gacchādhunā dhik tvāṃ nirdhanacaṅgam ity apavadan hrīto na veśyājanaḥ // JMu_50 //
analyzed: tasya eva adya nirāśa durbhaga paśo nirlajja gaccha adhunā dhik tvām nirdhana caṅgam iti apavadan hrītaḥ na veśyā janaḥ

original: ke cid dyūtakarā bhavanti katicid bhikṣācarāḥ kiṅkarāḥ ke cit karmakarāḥ pare dhanavatāṃ ślāghākarāḥ ke cana /
analyzed: ke cit dyūta karāḥ bhavanti katicid bhikṣā carāḥ kiṅkarāḥ ke cid karmakarāḥ pare dhanavatām ślāghā karāḥ ke cana

original: skandhāsaktapaṭaccarā dya(a)
analyzed: skandha āsakta paṭa carāḥ dya a

original: nucarā śokād akiṃcitkarās te 'mī kāmivarāḥ purā samabhavan veśyāsu ye gocarāḥ // JMu_51 //
analyzed: śokāt a kiṃcid karāḥ te mī kāmi varāḥ purā samabhavan veśyāsu ye gocarāḥ

original: veśyābhir vivaśīkṛtaḥ kupuruṣaḥ saṃjāyate durgato daurgatyena durodare nipatitaḥ svaṃ hārayaty eva sa /

original: ruddho dyūtakaraiḥ karoti vidhuraś cauryaṃ tatas taskaro vadhyaḥ syān nṛpater aho nu viṣayāsakter durantā gatiḥ // JMu_52 //
analyzed: ruddhaḥ dyūta karaiḥ karoti vidhuraḥ cauryam tatas taskaraḥ vadhyaḥ syāt nṛpateḥ aho nu viṣaya āsakteḥ durantā gatiḥ

original: ājīvaḥ kapaṭānurāgakalayā doṣo na duḥśīlatā vaidhavyaṃ na ca bādhate sadasatoḥ saṃbḥāvanā vyatyayāt /
analyzed: ājīvaḥ kapaṭa anurāga kalayā doṣaḥ na duḥśīla tā vaidhavyam na ca bādhate sat asatoḥ vyatyayāt

original: yatkimcitkaraṇe parasvaharaṇe vrīḍā na pīḍākarī no vā rājabhayaṃ ca hī bata sukhaṃ jīvanti vārastriyas= // JMu_53 //
analyzed: yat kimcid karaṇe para sva haraṇe vrīḍā na pīḍā karī no vā rāja bhayam ca hī bata sukham jīvanti

original: strīti prītikaraṃ puraḥ pariṇatau hālāhalaṃ kevalaṃ sarvasya vyasanaṃ kilaitad adhikaṃ tatrāpi veśyeti ca /
analyzed: strī iti prīti karam puras pariṇatau hālāhalam kevalam sarvasya vyasanam kila etat adhikam tatra api veśyā iti ca

original: prādhānyena tatas tad eva kathitaṃ yat tatprasaṅgena ca vyākhyātaṃ guṇadoṣajātam ucitaṃ cintyaṃ tad apy ādarāt // JMu_54 //
analyzed: prādhānyena tatas tat eva kathitam yat tad prasaṅgena ca vyākhyātam guṇa doṣa jātam ucitam cintyam tat api ādarāt

original: cetaḥśvāpadavāgurā daśaguṇasphārasmaroḍḍāmarāḥ kartavyāvadhayaḥ(?)

original: samudralaharīpūrair ivotpāditāḥ /
analyzed: samudra laharī pūraiḥ iva utpāditāḥ

original: nāpi svāmyasamarpaṇena na sakhe sakhyā (?)
analyzed: na api svāmya samarpaṇena na sakhe sakhyā

original: virodhena vā gūḍhāntarmukhasāhasavyatikarārakṣyāḥ paraṃ yoṣitaḥ // JMu_55 //

original: bhasmasnānamahāvrataṃ katipayaśrībhraṣṭasaṃbhāvitaṃ sarvāpahnavahastalāghavakalākūṭākṣaśikṣātmakam /
analyzed: bhasmasnāna mahāvratam katipaya śrī bhraṣṭa saṃbhāvitam sarva apahnava hasta lāghava kalā kūṭa akṣa śikṣā ātmakam

original: pratyāśāpunaruktahāraṇajagaddrohaṃ vivādāspadaṃ dāridryasya nimantraṇaṃ kim aparaṃ dhig dyūtalīlāyitam // JMu_56 //
analyzed: pratyāśā punarukta hāraṇa jagat droham vivāda āspadam dāridryasya nimantraṇam kim aparam dhik dyūta līlāyitam

original: hiṃsānirghṛṇakarmabhūḥ pratipadānekapramādaprasūr avyāpāradhurandharā pratikṛtā grāmyair jaghanyaiḥ śvabhiḥ /

original: śūnyāraṇyasadāpravāsavirasavyāyāmamithyāguṇāḥ kāyakleśaphalāvadhir matimatāṃ sevyā mṛgavyāpi kim // JMu_57 //
analyzed: śūnya araṇya sadā pravāsa virasa vyāyāma mithyā guṇāḥ kāya kleśa phala avadhiḥ matimatām sevyā mṛgavyā api kim

original: śaucācāravicāravāhyam akhilākāryāhitācāryakaṃ tattadgopyarahasyamantrabhiduraṃ nirnaiśam akṣṇos tamaḥ /

original: yattadvāddakalipramādavividhonmādaiḥ piśācāyitaṃ madyaṃ mūrtam amedhyam etad itarād anyasya kasya priyam // JMu_58 //
analyzed: yat tat vādda kali pramāda vividha unmādaiḥ piśācāyitam madyam mūrtam amedhyam etat itarāt anyasya kasya priyam

original: ulkāpātasahodaraṃ sahacaraṃ naidāghajhañjhāmaruj jhampānāṃ harakaṇṭhalālitagaradroṇīkuṭumbīkṛtam /
analyzed: ulkā pāta sahodaram sahacaram naidāgha jhañjhā marut jhampānām hara kaṇṭha lālita gara droṇī kuṭumbīkṛtam

original: jihvāgre karapattramitram aniśaṃ tat karkaśaṃ durvaco yasyāste vada kadvadaḥ katham aho sa api svayaṃ jīvati // JMu_59 //
analyzed: jihvā agre karapattra mitram aniśam tat karkaśam durvacaḥ yasyāḥ te vada kadvadaḥ katham aho sa api svayam jīvati

original: caṇḍaṃ daṇḍam akāṇḍa eva kalayan rājā prajānāṃ yamaḥ kurvan durvyayam arthadūṣaṇaruciḥ svasyaiva sa drohakṛt /
analyzed: caṇḍam daṇḍam akāṇḍe eva kalayan rājā prajānām yamaḥ kurvan durvyayam artha dūṣaṇa ruciḥ svasya eva sa droha kṛt

original: saumyaḥ saumyakaro 'tiviśvanayanānando 'bhinandyaḥ satāṃ saśrīkaḥ kamalākaraś ca suṣamāṃ kāṃ kām aho nārhati // JMu_60 //
analyzed: saumyaḥ saumya karaḥ ti viśva nayana ānandaḥ bhinandyaḥ satām sa śrīkaḥ kamala ākaraḥ ca suṣamām kām kām aho nā arhati

original: saṃsārasya maheśvaro dinapatir dhvāntasya vaidyo rujāṃ prāyaścittam aghasya śāstram aparijñānasya toyaṃ tṛṣaḥ /
analyzed: saṃsārasya maheśvaraḥ dinapatiḥ dhvāntasya vaidyaḥ rujām prāyaścittam aghasya śāstram a parijñānasya toyam tṛṣaḥ

original: siddhājñā garalasya tīrthasaraṇaṃ vṛddhatvavaiklavyayoḥ saptāṅgavyasanāvaleḥ praśamanopāyaś ca śikṣā satām // JMu_61 //
analyzed: siddha ājñā garalasya tīrtha saraṇam vṛddha tva vaiklavyayoḥ saptāṅga vyasana āvaleḥ praśamana upāyaḥ ca śikṣā satām

original: oṃkāraḥ sāhasānāṃ nijaguṇanipuṇapratyavekṣā sukhānāṃ kādācitkaḥ prayogaḥ sakalaparicayopādhivaidagdhyabandhuḥ /
analyzed: oṃkāraḥ sāhasānām nija guṇa nipuṇa pratyavekṣā sukhānām kādācitkaḥ prayogaḥ sakala paricaya upādhi vaidagdhya bandhuḥ

original: kaṣṭānām antyakāṣṭhā dhanarasikavaṇiglokayātrāprasaṅgo jīvajjanmāntaraṃ cety alam atibahunā svasti deśāntarāya // JMu_62 //
analyzed: kaṣṭānām antya kāṣṭhā dhana rasika vaṇij lokayātrā prasaṅgaḥ jīvat janmāntaram ca iti alam ati bahunā svasti deśa antarāya

original: yady apy asti savistarādbhutakathābhūyiṣṭhanānāvidha-vyākhyāyāṃ niravadyahṛdyacaritodāraṃ ca deśāntaram /
analyzed: yadi api asti sa vistara adbhuta kathā bhūyiṣṭha nānāvidha vyākhyāyām niravadya hṛdya carita udāram ca deśa antaram

original: tatrāpi svagṛheṣu guṇavadgoṣṭhīgariṣṭhīkṛta-sphāro 'nāratabhāratīrasapariṣyandaḥ sakhe sundaraḥ // JMu_63 //
analyzed: tatra api sva gṛheṣu guṇavat goṣṭhī gariṣṭhīkṛta sphāraḥ nārata bhāratī rasa pariṣyandaḥ sakhe sundaraḥ

original: te vandyā makarandabindumadhurair abhyutthitād akṣarair yeṣā vānti sarasvatīparimalodgārā mukhāmbhoruhāt /
analyzed: te vandyāḥ makaranda bindu madhuraiḥ abhyutthitāt akṣaraiḥ yeṣā vānti sarasvatī parimala udgārāḥ mukha ambhoruhāt

original: vandyās te 'pi tadantarālapatitā ye bhṛṅgabhaṅgījuṣaḥ sāndrānandakarambitaṃ jagad idaṃ vindanti nindanti ca // JMu_64 //
analyzed: vandyāḥ te tad antarāla patitāḥ ye bhṛṅga bhaṅgī juṣaḥ sāndra ānanda karambitam jagat idam vindanti nindanti ca

original: dṛṣṭvā deśam aśeṣam ā jalanidher ālokya kautūhalād āsthānīr avanībhṛtāṃ ca punar apy āgatya deśaṃ nijam /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā deśam aśeṣam ā jalanidheḥ ālokya kautūhalāt āsthānīḥ avanībhṛtām ca punar api āgatya deśam nijam

original: kāruṇyāt taruṇaṃ janaṃ prati satām abhyarthanābhis tathā so 'yaṃ saṃprati Jalhaṇena kavinā Mudghopadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ // JMu_65 //
analyzed: kāruṇyāt taruṇam janam prati satām abhyarthanābhiḥ tathā saḥ yam saṃprati jalhaṇena kavinā mudgha upadeśaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: vidyābhyāsaparamparāparicayair bālyaṃ kṛtārthīkṛtaṃ tāruṇyaṃ taruṇīnirantaraparīrambhaiś ca saṃbhāvitam /
analyzed: vidyā abhyāsa paramparā paricayaiḥ bālyam kṛtārthīkṛtam tāruṇyam taruṇī nirantara parīrambhaiḥ ca saṃbhāvitam

original: asmākaṃ surasindhurodhasi punaḥ śaṃbhāvadaṃbhārcanair vṛddhatvasya viśuddhatāṃ janayituṃ kartavyaśeṣaḥ sthitaḥ // JMu_66 //
analyzed: asmākam surasindhu rodhasi punar śaṃbhāvat aṃbhā arcanaiḥ vṛddha tvasya viśuddha tām janayitum kartavya śeṣaḥ sthitaḥ
